title: TikTok Shop Product and Creator Tracker
description: Track TikTok Shop products by URL, seller, keyword, or category. Extract price, availability, seller info, and creator videos with change alerts.

productUrls.title: Product URLs
productUrls.description: Direct TikTok Shop product URLs. Example: https://www.tiktok.com/shop/product/1234567890123456789

sellerHandles.title: Seller handles
sellerHandles.description: TikTok seller or creator handles without @. The actor visits the profile and discovers Shop product links.

keywords.title: Keywords
keywords.description: Search keywords to discover product links (region-dependent).

categoryUrls.title: Category or listing URLs
categoryUrls.description: TikTok Shop category/listing pages to extract product links from.

maxProductsPerSeller.title: Max products per seller
maxProductsPerSeller.description: Limit discovered products per seller profile.

maxCreatorsPerProduct.title: Max creator videos per product
maxCreatorsPerProduct.description: Limit of creator-linked videos to collect per product page.

maxResultsPerKeyword.title: Max products per keyword
maxResultsPerKeyword.description: Limit of product links to discover from each keyword search.

captureScreenshots.title: Capture screenshots
captureScreenshots.description: Store a full-page PNG per product in the key-value store.

notify.title: Notifications
notify.description: Optional: JSON object with Slack and/or generic webhook for change alerts. Example: {

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: Use Apify Proxy and select appropriate country group (e.g., RESIDENTIAL US).

maxConcurrency.title: Max concurrency
maxConcurrency.description: Maximum number of parallel browser pages.

requestHandlerTimeoutSecs.title: Per-page timeout (secs)
requestHandlerTimeoutSecs.description: Timeout for processing a single page.

maxRequestsPerCrawl.title: Max requests per crawl
maxRequestsPerCrawl.description: Global limit of processed requests for the run.

debug.title: Debug mode
debug.description: Increase log verbosity and keep extra diagnostics.
